price: (107) But as for those whose faces turn white, [they will be] within the mercy of Allāh. They will abide therein eternally.
arabic: وَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ٱبۡيَضَّتۡ وُجُوهُهُمۡ فَفِي رَحۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِۖ هُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ
